articles.title: Update your Android phone immediately to avoid this dangerous new threat - Express
articles.description: ANDROID users are being urged to check their smartphones for the latest updates NOW after a dangerous threat discovered that could give hackers access to personal data and even your location.
articles.content: Android owners should check right now that their devices are fully up to date with very latest security patches from Google. The alert comes after a shock new threat was unearthed by security experts… [+1981 chars]
